name: BURNT ASHES (itch)
description:
Burning Ashes is a 3D first-person game in the search and horror genre.

You are a prisoner trying to escape from prison after you have fallen into a coma,

Your job in the prison is to find a tool to open the prison door and then escape from the island
by the boat ... and then your adventure will start . you have to search , collect , escape and solve puzzles to open the gates and fall into an unknown fate . everything has a meaning , don't miss any detail

note :

if you leave in the middle of the level , all your progress will deleted and you have to finish the level before you can access to the next level
